original_title: กั๊ก กะ กาวน์
overview: The film introduces us to feel the loneliness that almost everyone faces it, the question to our life and love through the characters, Pan and Nick. Surrounded by loneliness, Pan is searching for what she's doing in each days. Until she meets Nick, the guy next door who is an artist, he begins a conversation and they start to learn the meaning of life from each other. They finally discover the goal in their life and the love that will not be faded from their memories.
title: My Space
